title: Binary File Text Extraction Platform
subtitle: Frontend handles queue and concurrency control; backend only calls the GetTypeAndContent extraction engine to reduce server load as much as possible.
selectFilesDesc: You can upload multiple files at once. For better performance, it is recommended to limit a single batch to no more than 10 files.
noTasks: No tasks yet. Please select files first.
uploadError: Error occurred while uploading or parsing. Please try again later.
headerDomainNote: Frontend domain: binaryextract.xyh.wiki · Backend domain: binaryextract-api.xyh.wiki
